console.log.language.noCostumeLangDirect: Costume lang directory not found. You can put customized .json language file in the "config\antigenius\lang" folder.
console.log.language.exceptionHappenWhen: Error happened when loading lang files.
console.log.language.suggestALanguageFor: The '%s' language you configured didn't found! With reference to your settings and operating system information, switch to %s.
console.log.language.askForTranslate: If you understand the current language, welcome to Github to help translate language files!
console.log.language.setLanguageToYourSy: Try to set the language to the system language: %s.
console.log.config.loadFailed: Load config failed, creating a default.
config.comment.data.mysql.hostname: Host name or IP address of MySQL server.
command.help.help: List all commands and their help messages.
command.help.head: Basic Usage
command.command.head: Subcommand Status
command.command.permission.level:
This subcommand's permission level.
level<2: Any player can use.
level>=2: Only CONSOLE and OPs available.
Search on minecraft wiki to known more: "Permission level"
This will be set automatically by enable/disable. Click and change a value.(NOT RECOMMEND).
